document.full_text: kidnappers are demanding 90 million euros ($127 million) for the return of four french hostages captured in niger and held hostage by al qaeda's north african wing, sources close to mediation efforts said on monday.
document.title: qaeda allies seek 90 million euros for hostages-sources
lines_and_colors: kidnappers are demanding 90 million euros ($127 million) for the return of four french hostages captured in niger and held hostage by al qaeda's north african wing, sources close to mediation efforts said on monday.
